name: 德沃拉·怀尔德
name_full: 德沃拉·怀尔德 Devora Wilde
introduction: Bulgarian-born, Devora moved to England at the age of six. After a chance role in Ron Howard's "Rush," she accepted a place at Drama Studio London. She is known for her roles in "Pandora" (The CW), "Hollyoaks" (Channel 4), "The Dare" (Lionsgate/Millennium Films) and "Stolen Life" (Nova TV). "A Precious Life," in which Devora played a major supporting role, premiered at the Cannes Film Festival. Devora is also a gifted voice actress and continues to work on a range of high-profile video games, including the eagerly-anticipated "Baldur's Gate III." Devora is a Grade 5 piano player and singer, and is fluent in English, Bulgarian and Russian.
